properties.sql:
SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*, sp.Id AS processId, sp.Name AS processName, sact.Id AS instanceId, sact.Name AS activityName,
        sass.ResourceId AS assignee, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco, ip.c_nome AS cliente, CONCAT(ato.c_dataOutorga, ' ', ato.c_horaOutorga) AS DataAgendamento, 
        dp.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio, sla.c_data_fim as DataFim, ato.c_cedula_entidade as entidadeAutenticadora
FROM shkprocesses sp
LEFT JOIN shkprocesses sp2 on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = sp2.Id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id 
LEFT JOIN (select ActivityId, group_concat(ResourceId separator '; ') as ResourceId from SHKAssignmentsTable group by ActivityId) sass on sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id AND ip.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK' 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
LEFT JOIN app_fd_atos ato ON ato.c_id_agendamento = ag.id AND ato.c_status = 'AGD'
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.oid = '1000001' OR ssta.oid = '1000003' OR ssta.oid = '1000005')
AND sp.id not like '%Credito%'
AND (sla.c_estado_atividade is null or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Em curso' or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Pendente') 
AND (Select count(ID) from shkprocesses 
    where ActivityRequesterProcessId = sp2.id
    AND ( If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_BCP%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "BCP", '')
    OR IF( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_BIC%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "BIC", '')
    OR IF( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_BST%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "BST", '')
    OR IF( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_NVB%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "NVB", '')
    OR IF( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_MTG%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "MTG", '')
    OR IF( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_GEN%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "GEN", '')
    OR IF( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CNT_ABN%', ID like '%Contratacao%' AND dp.c_nome_banco LIKE "ABN", '')
    OR If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_FLT_%', ID like '%Filtro%', '')
    OR If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_PRD_%', ID like '%Producao%', '')
    OR If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_VAL_%', ID like '%Validacao%', '')
    OR If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_AO%', ID like '%AcompanhamentoOutorgas%', '')
    OR If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_CON%', ID like '%Conclusoes%', '')
    OR If( '#currentUser.department.id#' like '%_ARQ%', ID like '%Arquivo%', '')
    )
) > 0
